trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex*> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex*> property for navigation in wizard controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<> *> 屬性和<> *> 精靈控制項中的導覽屬性。

trans-unit.source: The WizardNavigationEventArgs class provides the data needed for the various navigation events in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: WizardNavigationEventArgs 類別會提供各種巡覽事件中所需的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardNavigationEventArgs object to indicate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制項使用 WizardNavigationEventArgs 物件來表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>目前顯示在物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項旁會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation to the next step in the wizard should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應取消瀏覽到目前精靈的下一個步驟。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該取消瀏覽到下一個步驟。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>物件中目前顯示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引值，表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>目前顯示在物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項旁會顯示。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引值，表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控制項旁會顯示。
